content: Head to the Fright Cliff on the opposite side of the Yellow Wind Ridge from the Valley of Despair, and travel through it to reach an area with the Rockrest Flat Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Black Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Head to the Fright Cliff on the opposite side of the Yellow Wind Ridge from the Valley of Despair, and travel through it to reach an area with the Rockrest Flat Shrine.
